import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Home() { const[data,setData]=useState([]) const[tag,setTag]=useState() const API_KEY='ebd97901b6ca451482a89a2881456f4f' async function GetData(){ let data = await axios.get('https://api.rawg.io/api/games?key=ebd97901b6ca451482a89a2881456f4f') setData(data.data.results) console.log(data.data.results) } function getFilterdData(){ const keepers = data .filter(({ scenario }) => scenario.flag === 1 ) .map(({ scenario, profile }) => { return { ...scenario, profile } }) console.log(keepers) } useEffect(()=>{ GetData() },[]) useEffect(()=>{ getFilterdData() },[tag]) return ( <>

Welcome to Home Page

Related Tags : Shooter Action RPG {setTag(e.target.textContent)}}>Puzzle
{data?
{tag?data.map((game,index)=>(
{game.name}

{game.rating}

)):data.map((game,index)=>(
{game.name}

{game.rating}

))} {}
:''} ) }
